body: Beginning to lay the groundwork to start removing global variables from Toxic. The first of many to come. - - - This change isâ€‚[](https://reviewable.io/reviews/TokTok/toxic/265)

comment_data.body: This probably shouldn't have been renamed?

I guess a lot of these things are leaked by design, but it would be nice to be able to return 0 from main and get a list of actual leaks by having it break out of the do_toxic loop and `kill` the things `init`'d in the far future. :P

 /*  toxic.h

comment_data.body: I've been working on this since last year :^)

Also update copyrights
